short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Latest weather data for the selected region

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This easy-to-use weather extension helps you find weather data for your area or a region of your choice. Write the name of your city and read all the necessary weather information you wanted to know! No ads, no unnecessary info just for you!
